greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} k * x^k / (1 - k * x^k)^k.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: a(p) = p + 1, where p is prime.
mathematica: nmax = 45; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[k x^k/(1 - k x^k)^k, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] // Rest
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, (n/d)^d * binomial(n/d+d-2, d-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 02 2019
(PARI) N=66; x='x+O('x^N); Vec(sum(k=1, N, k*x^k/(1-k*x^k)^k)) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 03 2019
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 02 2019
